text: Mathieu Kérékou, (2 September 1933"Après 29 ans de pouvoir, le Président Kérékou tire sa révérence", IRIN, 6 April 2006 . - 14 October 2015) was a Beninese politician. He was President of Benin from 1972 to 1991 and again from 1996 to 2006. After seizing power in a military coup, he ruled the country for 17 years. He was defeated in the 1991 presidential election, but was returned to the presidency in the 1996 election and controversially re- elected in 2001. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1933 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Presidents of Benin
title: Mathieu Kérékou
